front.title: SNMP MIB extension for Multiprotocol Interconnect over X.25

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines objects for managing Multiprotocol Interconnect (including IP) traffic carried over X.25. The objects defined here, along with the objects in the "SNMP MIB extension for the Packet Layer of X.25", "SNMP MIB extension for LAPB", and the "Definitions of Managed Objects for RS-232-like Hardware Devices", combine to allow management of the traffic over an X.25 protocol stack.
